price: ߊ߬ ߕߊ ߟߋ߬ ߣߌߡߊ ߟߎ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߛߊ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߘߎ߱ ߘߐ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ ߞߋ߬ߟߋ߲߬ߞߋ߬ߟߋ߲߬ߠߊ ߞߟߏߣߍ߲߫ ߊ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߟߋ߬
arabic: وَلَهُۥ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ كُلّٞ لَّهُۥ قَٰنِتُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: walahu man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi kullun lahu qānitūna
